Amazon.com,Inc. offers a range of products and services\n through its Websites. The Company operates through three \nsegments : North America, International and Amazon Web Services(AWS)
Apple Inc. \n1 Apple Park Way, CUPERTINO, CA, United States \n1-408-9961010
Technology - Technology Equipment - Computers, Phones and \nHousehold Electronics - Phones and Handheld Devices - Phones \n and Smart Phones

Apple Inc. designs, manufatures and markets mobile communication and media devices, personal computers and portable digital music players. The Company sells a range of related software, services, accessories, networking solutions, and third party digital content and applications

This is a trading app that displays certain information about famous companies and their stocks. This application also displays growth charts that represent the growth of the shares owned by the respective companies
